Name: [Affinity] Up to the Task
Desc: Rina has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Dance Duet]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo.
Desc2: Rina and her little Bangboo are in excellent condition. Navigating through the dangerous Hollows is as easy as playing a game of tag.
